alert.note: Alert for Greene; Taliaferro (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 7:16AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Greene, northwestern Taliaferro and southwestern Oglethorpe Counties through 745 AM EST... At 716 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Wrayswood, or 10 miles northeast of Madison, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Union Point, Woodville, Maxeys, Stephens, Penfield, Wrayswood, Philomath, Greshamville and Daniel Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST for north central and east central Georgia.
